snippet: Ethnic rebels in northern Myanmar staged a deadly attack on a prison convoy, highlighting one of the country’s violence-plagued corners days before President Obama’s historic visit.
abstract: Ethnic rebels in northern Myanmar stage deadly attack on prison convoy, highlighting one of country’s violence-plagued corners days before Pres Obama’s historic visit.
lead_paragraph: Ethnic rebels in northern Myanmar staged a deadly attack on a prison convoy, highlighting one of the country’s violence-plagued corners days before President Obama’s historic visit.

headline.seo: Rebels Attack Prison Convoy in Myanmar
